name: techflow-solutions
description: TechFlow Solutions - Full-stack web application for software development services

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && npm run clean 2>nul || echo "Backend clean completed"
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && npm run clean 2>nul || echo "Frontend clean completed"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && echo 'Build completo - pronto para deploy'

author: TechFlow Solutions
